tasks.label: Build with Fixed Modules
tasks.command: cp src\shared\init_fixed.lua src\shared\init.lua && cp src\client\init_fixed.client.lua src\client\init.client.lua && cp src\client\interaction\InteractionSystem_fixed.lua src\client\interaction\InteractionSystem.lua && rojo build second.project.json -o ForeverBuild_fixed.rbxm
